item.itunes:author: ESPN_F1

item.title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Crunch Time
item.description: A stunning performance in Abu Dhabi from Sebastian Vettel leaves the title in his hands. Can Fernando Alonso do anything to stop a third consecutive title? Plus, Nico Rosberg and Davide Valsecchi join the pod to discuss 2013.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Crunch Time
media:content.media:description: A stunning performance in Abu Dhabi from Sebastian Vettel leaves the title in his hands. Can Fernando Alonso do anything to stop a third consecutive title? Plus, Nico Rosberg and Davide Valsecchi join the pod to discuss 2013.

item.itunes:author: ESPN_F1

item.title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Two Horse Race
item.description: Can the prancing horse of Fernando Alonso catch the raging bull of Sebastian Vettel? Plus Pastor Maldonado and Bruno Senna join the pod to chat their plans for 2013.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Two Horse Race
media:content.media:description: Can the prancing horse of Fernando Alonso catch the raging bull of Sebastian Vettel? Plus Pastor Maldonado and Bruno Senna join the pod to chat their plans for 2013.

item.itunes:author: ESPN_F1

item.title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Hamilton's Fresh Start
item.description: Can Lewis Hamilton propel Mercedes to the top of the grid, or has he made the wrong decision in leaving McLaren? Plus, new Marussia driver Max Chiltern on a dream weekend in Singapore.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Hamilton's Fresh Start
media:content.media:description: Can Lewis Hamilton propel Mercedes to the top of the grid, or has he made the wrong decision in leaving McLaren? Plus, new Marussia driver Max Chiltern on a dream weekend in Singapore.

item.itunes:author: ESPN_F1

item.title: ESPN F1 Podcast: F1's Transfer Window
item.description: McLaren insist Lewis Hamilton's future remains with them, but rumours over a move to Mercedes won't go away. Jonathan Legard, Lawrence Edmondson and Chris Medland discuss the merry-go-round that will begin if Lewis does jump ship.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: F1's Transfer Window
media:content.media:description: McLaren insist Lewis Hamilton's future remains with them, but rumours over a move to Mercedes won't go away. Jonathan Legard, Lawrence Edmondson and Chris Medland discuss the merry-go-round that will begin if Lewis does jump ship.

item.itunes:author: ESPN_F1

item.title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Decision Time
item.description: As the teams return from the summer break, the future of a number of drivers still looks uncertain. Jonathan Legard, Laurence Edmondson and Chris Medland look ahead to the end of the European season.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Decision Time
media:content.media:description: As the teams return from the summer break, the future of a number of drivers still looks uncertain. Jonathan Legard, Laurence Edmondson and Chris Medland look ahead to the end of the European season.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Decision Time
media:content.media:description: As the teams return from the summer break, the future of a number of drivers still looks uncertain. Jonathan Legard, Laurence Edmondson and Chris Medland look ahead to the end of the European season.

item.itunes:author: ESPN_F1

item.title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Welcome to the Eurozone
item.description: As Formula 1 heads in to Europe the pod team discuss whether a clear leader will be found in the championship? Plus, Martin Whitmarsh joins the pod to discuss the McLaren nose and pit stops. Join Jonathan Legard, Laurence Edmondson and Chris Medland.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Welcome to the Eurozone
media:content.media:description: As Formula 1 heads in to Europe the pod team discuss whether a clear leader will be found in the championship? Plus, Martin Whitmarsh joins the pod to discuss the McLaren nose and pit stops. Join Jonathan Legard, Laurence Edmondson and Chris Medland.

item.itunes:author: ESPN_F1

item.title: ESPN F1 Podcast: At The Double
item.description: Will Sebastian Vettel become F1's youngest ever double world champion in Sinagpore or will the inevitable be delayed? Plus, a look at the futures of Button, Webber and the rising Toro Rosso stars. Join Jonathan Legard and the ESPN F1 team.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: At The Double
media:content.media:description: Will Sebastian Vettel become F1's youngest ever double world champion in Sinagpore or will the inevitable be delayed? Plus, a look at the futures of Button, Webber and the rising Toro Rosso stars. Join Jonathan Legard and the ESPN F1 team.

item.itunes:author: ESPN_F1

item.title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Take the Bull by the horns
item.description: As Sebastian Vettel makes it 5 wins out of 6, can anyone match the pace of the Red Bulls? Plus safety comes under the spotlight again after a number of crashes at Monaco. Join Jon Harris-Bass and the ESPNF1 team.

media:content.media:title: ESPN F1 Podcast: Take the Bull by the horns
media:content.media:description: As Sebastian Vettel makes it 5 wins out of 6, can anyone match the pace of the Red Bulls? Plus safety comes under the spotlight again after a number of crashes at Monaco. Join Jon Harris-Bass and the ESPNF1 team.
